I bought this smartphone because I think it's a good choice for my needs. I'm happy with my decision to buy it and feel that it was worth the price. However, I am surprised and a little bit disappointed when I find out that my best friend bought the same phone for less money. This has made me wonder if there might be any hidden problems or differences between our phones, even though they are the exact same model.
